description: From a keyword in C++ and derived programming languages, short for Boolean.

entries.meaning: (programming) A Boolean variable (one whose value is either true or false).

description: Likely from replacement of the 'c' in cool.

verbs.description: bool (third-person singular simple present bools, present participle booling, simple past and past participle booled)

entries.meaning: (slang) To relax or hang out (especially with someone).
examples: I'm going to go bool with the boys.
